SPAM vs HAM

This project detects whether an email is SPAM or HAM using
machine learning models : Naive Bayes, Logistic Regression and Linear SVM.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: CONTENTS:



   INFORMATION | ANALYZE <information/analyze>
   INFORMATION | DATAFRAME <information/dataframe>
   INFORMATION | VECTORFRAME <information/vectorframe>

   api/modules

   TRANSFORM | CLEANING <api/src.transform>
   VECTORIZATION | TF-IDF <api/src.vectorize>
   MODELS | NAIVE BAYES <api/src.model_bayes>
   MODELS | LOGISTIC REGRESSION <api/src.model_logistic>
   MODELS | LINEAR SVM <api/src.model_linear>
   METRICS AND ANALYZE <api/src.metrics>
   PLOTS AND REPORTS <api/src.plots>
   UTILS <api/src.utils>
